item.title: Kooky TorrentFlux
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Today I noticed that my TorrentFlux installation (the thing that's seeding my comic book preview torrents) started showing odd ownership changes for my older torrents, turns out it was just a setting in the config file. All's good now, everyone can calm down and get some much needed rest. The forum thread that explains it all.
